text: == Ayyuthaya sack of Kodiah (1876) == Siamese (Thailand) sacked Kodiah in 1876 leading to death of Muhammad Shaybaji. Kedahan lost alot of land. == Kedahan Revenge after Ayyuthaya sack of Kodiah == The unknown king kedah got revenge by killing the Ayyuthaya ambassadors and secretly attacked Phra Nakhon and killed 3-2 Civilians.
title: Kedahan-Siamese War
